name: pushbullet-desktop
readme:
# Pushbullet for Desktop [![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/sidneys/pushbullet-desktop](https://badges.gitter.im/sidneys/pushbullet-desktop.svg)](https://gitter.im/sidneys/pushbullet-desktop?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge) [![build status](http://img.shields.io/travis/sidneys/pushbullet-desktop.svg?style=flat)](http://travis-ci.org/sidneys/pushbullet-desktop) [![issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/sidneys/pushbullet-desktop.svg)](https://github.com/sidneys/pushbullet-desktop/issues) [![codeship](https://codeship.com/projects/a273af20-227c-0134-0f44-72d64b61c085/status?branch=master)](https://codeship.com/projects/a273af20-227c-0134-0f44-72d64b61c085/) 
**Pushbullet for Desktop** is a lightweight & unobstrusive cross-platform client for [PushBullet](https://pushbullet.com/).  Receive native push notifications on OS X, Windows and Linux. *Not affiliated with PushBullet Inc..*

## Features

- Receives native PushBullet notifications
- Runs in the background (as OSX Menubar or Windows Tray app)
- Simple, Webview-based setup
- In-Notification Channel images for - for channels like [IFTTT](https://ifttt.com/), [Zapier](https://zapier.com/) or [Pushbullet Chat](http://lifehacker.com/huge-pushbullet-update-adds-instant-messaging-chat-hea-1714870644)
- Shows in-Notification image previews

## Installation

Download the latest release at:  [Pushbullet for Desktop Releases](https://github.com/sidneys/pushbullet-desktop/releases)

## Development

### Install required node packages

```
npm install
```

### Start development
Local development requires running an Electron instance.   
To start one, simply install [electron-prebuilt](https://github.com/electron-userland/electron-prebuilt) globally:

```
npm --global electron-prebuilt
```
Then simply to the pushbullet-desktop repository folder and start it:

```
electron ./app
```

### Building

> Building Windows binaries requires [Wine](https://winehq.org) and [MakeNSIS](https://nsis.sourceforge.net/Docs/Chapter3.htm). To install it on OSX using [Homebrew](https://brew.sh):

```
brew install wine && brew install makensis
```

> Building Linux binaries requires [fpm](https://github.com/jordansissel/fpm). To install it on OSX using [Homebrew](https://brew.sh):

```
sudo gem install fpm
```


> To build all platforms (darwin, linux, win32):

```
npm run build
```

> To build a specific platform:

```
npm run build <darwin|linux|win32>
```

### Update Changelog

```
npm run-script changelog
```

___
